extractFactDictList.question: How many types of cholesterol are there?
extractFactDictList.sentence: There are two types of cholesterol: HDL (high-density lipoprotein) and LDL (low-density lipoprotein).

extractFactDictList.question: How many types of cholesterol levels are there in the blood?
extractFactDictList.sentence: Doctors monitor these two types of cholesterol levels in the blood to assess the risk of heart disease and other health problems.
